title: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed based on personal preference, but this should be changed. It is not clear to users why some actions are in the context menu and some are not. All actions should be reachable from the editor without having to switch views.
OB: When I right-click on the text, the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is not present in the context menu.
EB: I expected to see the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action in the context menu when I right-click on the text.
SR:
1. Open the editor.
2. Select some text.
3. Right-click on the selected text.
4. Verify if the 'Add Javadoc Comment' action is present in the context menu.
